result.execSummary:
Abel L Quinones Herstad was extradited to another county, state or jurisdiction. Extradition means Abel L Quinones Herstad was accused or convicted of an offense in another county, state or jurisdiction and was taken there to face their charge(s) or conviction.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Abel L Quinones Herstad

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Abel L Quinones Herstad not in court, in custody.  Attorney Fred Richardson III in court for Abel L Quinones Herstad.  Attorney Amanda Kirklewski in court for State of Wisconsin. 

Case in court for a status conference.  Defense informs the Court that Mr. Herstad has been picked up and is in the custody of Illinois.  Court confirmed with the jail.  Case administratively closed.
Copy of Governor's Warrant; received and filed.

Defendant Abel L Quinones Herstad appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Fred Richardson III in court for Abel L Quinones Herstad.  Attorney James C Griffin in court for State of Wisconsin. 

Case in Court for status conference. Discussion placed on the record. State has received Governor's Warrant for Defendant. Defense advised the Court, Defendant has been served with  Governor's Warrant. For reason stated on the record Court ordered cases adjourned for status conference, branch 2.
Status conference scheduled for October 27, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Abel L Quinones Herstad not in court, in custody.  Attorney Fred Richardson III appeared by video for Abel L Quinones Herstad.  Prosecuting attorney James C Griffin in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant not produced, appearance waived. Deputies could not produce defendant. State is requesting an extension, defense is objecting. Court grants extension. Case is adjourned in Branch 02.
Status conference scheduled for October 13, 2022 at 09:00 am.

Defendant Abel L Quinones Herstad in court with attorney Fred Richardson.  Defendant Abel L Quinones Herstad in custody.  Amanda Korin Kirklewski appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
Statements by defense. Case adjourned for status conference, Branch 2.  Status conference scheduled for September 14, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

CASE RECALLED AT 12:41 PM:
Defendant Abel L Quinones Herstad in court with attorney Jane Jerman.  Defendant Abel L Quinones Herstad in custody.  James C Griffin appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Abel L Quinones Herstad appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Childs, Branch 2.
Court reviewed complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of rights and right to file a Writ of Habeas Corpus.  Court found the defendant is the person wanted in the State of Illinois.
Defendant contested extradition.  Court ordered Defendant REMANDED into the custody of the Milwaukee County Sheriff's Department. 8/8 status date vacated.  Status conference scheduled for August 16, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Abel L Quinones Herstad in court with attorney Jane Jerman.  Defendant Abel L Quinones Herstad in custody.  James C Griffin appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Abel L Quinones Herstad appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Childs, Branch 2.  Court reviewed complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of rights and right to file a Writ of Habeas Corpus.  Court found the defendant is the person wanted in the State of Illinois.  Defendant waived extradition.  Signed Waiver of Extradition received and filed.  Court ordered the defendant REMANDED into the custody of the Milwaukee County Sheriff's Department.  Status conference scheduled for August 8, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
